title: The 25 Biggest Amazon Discounts to Add to Cart This Black Friday Weekend
description: Black Friday is here, but there are often so many deals to choose from that it can get overwhelming. From electronics to home goods, beauty and wellness, to gifts, it’s hard to determine what items are actually worth buying on sale — and what’s just a bunch of hype. As a consumer, it’s also frustrating […]
author: Alisa Rendor
excerpt: We've rounded up the biggest discounts to shop online during Amazon's Black Friday Sale 2024. These are the deals and products actually worth buying.
text: The 25 Biggest Amazon Discounts to Add to Cart This Black Friday Weekend These deals save you up to 70% off on top electronics, home goods and devices Getty Images If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission. Black Friday is here, but there are often so many deals to choose from that it can get overwhelming. From electronics to home goods, beauty and wellness, to gifts, it’s hard to determine what items are actually worth buying on sale — and what’s just a bunch of hype. As a consumer, it’s also frustrating to see the word “sale” advertised in almost every product, but with very limited discounts on most of them. That’s why we’ve done the work for you to look up some of Amazon’s biggest deals — with actually worthwhile discounts — so you don’t have to. Here are the best Black Friday 2024 deals to shop this weekend. (Note: many of these discounts are reserved for Amazon Prime members. Not a Prime member? Get a 30-day free trial here and use it to shop the biggest Amazon Black Friday discounts now). Beats Studio Pro This best-selling Beats wireless headphones feature noise cancelling technology, personalized spatial audio, lossless audio, Apple and Android compatibility and lasts up to 40 hours of battery life. If that still doesn’t sound amazing (pun intended), they are currently 54% off on Amazon, making it the lowest price we’ve ever seen for this set. dreame Ultra Robot Vacuum For someone who is always on-the-go and prefers a constantly clean home, this powerful ultra robot vacuum will be your best friend — just set it on “run” and it’ll automatically clean your space and return to its dock when it’s done. What we like: it also doubles a a mop and is both self-refilling and emptying so you can just sit back and relax while it does its magic. Robot vacuums are one of the top sale items for Black Friday but this one gets the biggest discount at 50% off. LandAirSea 54 GPS Tracker Keep track of your little stuff (I.e. luggage) and big stuff (I.e. cars) alike with this GPS tracking device, which boasts a waterproof design and a super long battery life. Anova Culinary Sous Vide Precision Cooker Pro The Anova Precision Cooker Pro keeps the guessing out of every home chef as it circulates water at the exact temperature required for perfectly-cooked meals, so you never over or undercook your food again. At 50% off, it’s even cheaper than Prime Day and offers a great gifting idea for the holidays too. Oral-B iO Series 7 Toothbrush The Oral-B iO Series 7 Rechargable Electric Toothbrush is one of the most popular items on Amazon, and for good reason: one reviewer mentioned that it was highly recommended by their dental hygienist, and multiple raves have been made about the visual live cleaning feature on the Oral-B app, the toothbrush being user friendly, and the multiple mode choices that make brushing more effective. At 45% off, this is the cheapest price we’re seeing online for this health essential. Marshall Kilburn II Bluetooth Portable Speaker This is not a regular speaker, this is a cool speaker. Marshall’s top panel features analogue control knobs for bass, treble and volume so you can customize your sound however you like. In addition to its amp-inspired styling, the Kilburn II has a guitar-inspired carrying strap, has a compact size, and is waterproof so it’s a great one to take on trips or even from room to room for at-home use. Dyson Hot+Cool Jet Focus Fan Dyson products almost never go on sale but the Dyson Hot + Cool Heater and Fan is $170 cheaper today that it’s been all year. This is an incredible 2-in-1 option for all seasons, with heating and cooler functions. The two modes, alongside its 70-degree oscillation feature and a sleep timer, make this product a great investment, supported by the iconic Dyson technology and many reviews that describe it as a “worth it” and reliable purchase. Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum Speaking of Dyson, the brand’s iconic stick vacuum is a whopping 54% off for Black Friday on Amazon (for Prime members). Get all the cleaning and suction power of a Dyson in a slim and cordless set with up to 40 minutes of run time and an advanced filtration system that promises to trap 99.99% of dust and particles as small as 0.3 microns. Shark AZ2002 Vertex Powered Lift-Away Upright Vacuum Need more cleaning power? Shark’s upright vacuum features “lift away” technology, a “PowerFins brushroll” and a soft roller that combine to pick up more dust, pet hair and debris from your floors and carpets. At 55% off, this is one of the biggest Black Friday discount son Shark vacuums online. SAMSUNG 32-Inch Odyssey Curved Gaming Monitor This Samsung 32-Inch Odyssey Curved Monitor has premium-quality resolution that shows incredibly detailed, pin-sharp images to take your gaming experience to the next level. Images look more life-like and the curved detail empowers your peripheral vision, giving a fuller view of the game. The under-$200 price represents the biggest discount this year. CHEFMAN Indoor Pizza Oven For pizza lovers, it could be challenging to make restaurant-quality pizza at home, but this indoor oven is a great option to get closer to that. This CHERMAN Indoor Pizza Oven has six modes: Neapolitan, New York, Thin-Crust, Pan, or Frozen, and makes 12-inch pizzas in minutes. Get it on sale during Black Friday for a massive 60% discount. PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of The Mountain Bundle (PSVR2) Take your PlayStation game to the next level and step into the world of virtual reality. This set features eye tracking, headset feedback, 3D Audio and highly intuitive controls for an immersive gaming experience. It’s just one of many gaming consoles marked down for Black Friday. Garmin vívoactive 5 To the athletes and casual trainers alike, a smartwatch is always must. The Garmin brand is a trusted leader in this space and this watch has 30 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps, a sleep tracker, AMOLED display up to 11 days of battery life and a durable, go-anywhere build. It’s under $200 for the first time too. DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo with DJI RC 2 $899.00 $1,549.00 42% off The DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo with DJI RC 2 is at 42% off today, bringing the price down below $1000. What we like: this drone captures images at an impressive 48MP and delivers stunning 4K/60fps HDR videos with dual cameras, so every shot will surely be cinematic and breathtaking. Cricut Explore 3 The Cricut Explore 3 is a great way to enter your crafting era and DIY almost anything your heart desires. The machine cuts 100+ materials, including cardstock, vinyl, iron-on, glitter paper, cork, and bonded fabric up to 12-feet without a mat, plus includes a digital library of 30 images while cutting 2x faster than its previous version. GYH LED Face Mask Light Therapy This LED face mask is described as having 180 professional-grade lamp beads that are six times more powerful than others to help smooth, refine and rejuvenate your skin. At 50% off, it’s the best price for a top-rated red light therapy mask online. What you’ll like: the high-energy output ensures that you get the maximum benefit from light, with shorter use times of just 5-10 minutes. It’s currently half-off now, but they also offer a two-year worry-free guarantee with full refund so you can upgrade your skincare game with complete ease. SAMSUNG 75-Inch Class Neo QLED $1,747.99 $2,997.99 42% off A number of TVs are on sale for Black Friday including this Samsung 75-Inch Smart TV, which hits all the marks of a high-end TV including 4K resolution, Dolby Atmos, anti-glare technology, a dedicated gaming hub and so much more. Today at 42% off, your home TV experience will be upgraded with its unparalleled brightness, contrast and color. De’Longhi Magnifica Start Espresso & Coffee Machine Start your day with a fresh morning brew with this De’Longhi Espresso & Coffee Machine. You can enjoy a latte, macchiato, cappuccino, espresso and coffee served iced or hot. It has an automatic milk frother and a built-in grinder with 13 different settings. Currently at $499, this is the lowest we’ve ever seen it and now is the best time to take advantage. GOTHAM STEEL Hammered 15-Piece Copper Pots and Pans A 15-piece non-stick pots and pans set for under $100 is definitely a steal. Besides the unique hammered copper aesthetic, its premium non-stick capability needs no seasoning, oil or butter for healthier meals all around. ELEPHAS Movie Projector Sit back, relax and watch your favorite shows in 4K with this projector that’s built for both indoor and outdoor showings. It has a built-in “App Store” compatible with Netflix, Youtube and Prime Video, and can play genuine movie videos without considering copyright. VOPLLS Full HD Portable Home Theater Projector Go even smaller with this palm-sized projector, which offers full HD quality and a screen up to 210 inches in size. Amazon says more than 5,000 people have purchased this mini projector in the last few weeks alone. Venustas Men’s Heated Vest This is a great vest for any winter-related activity, whether it be skiing, hiking, running or just doing your daily activities. It has four different settings and generates warmth all around the body so you can be comfortable braving the cold, whatever your activities may be. Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows These best-selling bed pillows make a great gift or an addition to your collection — reviewers are saying that you get quality, comfort and value all at the same time without compromising your budget. This is a perpetual Amazon bestseller and at 41% off, there’s no better time to refresh your pillow collection at home. SafeRest Mattress Protector Keep your mattress investment safe with this highly-rated mattress protector from SafeRest. At 54% off today, it’s an affordable way to ensure protection and comfort for your bed and stay-worry free from any unwanted bugs or elements. RAK Multitool Pen There wouldn’t be a pen as versatile as the RAK Multitool — it has eight combined features including led light, stylus top, standard and metric rulers, bubble leveler, bottle opener, flathead and phillips screwdriver, and of course, an actual pen for writing needs. Samsonite Evolve Se Hardside Expandable Luggage Set Amazon has a ton of luggage deals for Black Friday but the most worthwhile deal is on this Samsonite set, which gets you two hard-side suitcases for essentially the price of one. Multiple colors are discounted. See more Amazon Black Friday deals here. html:
The 25 Biggest Amazon Discounts to Add to Cart This Black Friday Weekend

These deals save you up to 70% off on top electronics, home goods and devices

If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

Black Friday is here, but there are often so many deals to choose from that it can get overwhelming. From electronics to home goods, beauty and wellness, to gifts, it’s hard to determine what items are actually worth buying on sale — and what’s just a bunch of hype.

As a consumer, it’s also frustrating to see the word “sale” advertised in almost every product, but with very limited discounts on most of them. That’s why we’ve done the work for you to look up some of Amazon’s biggest deals — with actually worthwhile discounts — so you don’t have to. Here are the best Black Friday 2024 deals to shop this weekend.

(Note: many of these discounts are reserved for Amazon Prime members. Not a Prime member? Get a 30-day free trial here and use it to shop the biggest Amazon Black Friday discounts now).

Beats Studio Pro

This best-selling Beats wireless headphones feature noise cancelling technology, personalized spatial audio, lossless audio, Apple and Android compatibility and lasts up to 40 hours of battery life. If that still doesn’t sound amazing (pun intended), they are currently 54% off on Amazon, making it the lowest price we’ve ever seen for this set.

dreame Ultra Robot Vacuum

For someone who is always on-the-go and prefers a constantly clean home, this powerful ultra robot vacuum will be your best friend — just set it on “run” and it’ll automatically clean your space and return to its dock when it’s done. What we like: it also doubles a a mop and is both self-refilling and emptying so you can just sit back and relax while it does its magic. Robot vacuums are one of the top sale items for Black Friday but this one gets the biggest discount at 50% off.

LandAirSea 54 GPS Tracker

Keep track of your little stuff (I.e. luggage) and big stuff (I.e. cars) alike with this GPS tracking device, which boasts a waterproof design and a super long battery life.

Anova Culinary Sous Vide Precision Cooker Pro

The Anova Precision Cooker Pro keeps the guessing out of every home chef as it circulates water at the exact temperature required for perfectly-cooked meals, so you never over or undercook your food again. At 50% off, it’s even cheaper than Prime Day and offers a great gifting idea for the holidays too.

Oral-B iO Series 7 Toothbrush

The Oral-B iO Series 7 Rechargable Electric Toothbrush is one of the most popular items on Amazon, and for good reason: one reviewer mentioned that it was highly recommended by their dental hygienist, and multiple raves have been made about the visual live cleaning feature on the Oral-B app, the toothbrush being user friendly, and the multiple mode choices that make brushing more effective. At 45% off, this is the cheapest price we’re seeing online for this health essential.

Marshall Kilburn II Bluetooth Portable Speaker

This is not a regular speaker, this is a cool speaker. Marshall’s top panel features analogue control knobs for bass, treble and volume so you can customize your sound however you like. In addition to its amp-inspired styling, the Kilburn II has a guitar-inspired carrying strap, has a compact size, and is waterproof so it’s a great one to take on trips or even from room to room for at-home use.

Dyson Hot+Cool Jet Focus Fan

Dyson products almost never go on sale but the Dyson Hot + Cool Heater and Fan is $170 cheaper today that it’s been all year. This is an incredible 2-in-1 option for all seasons, with heating and cooler functions. The two modes, alongside its 70-degree oscillation feature and a sleep timer, make this product a great investment, supported by the iconic Dyson technology and many reviews that describe it as a “worth it” and reliable purchase.

Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum

Speaking of Dyson, the brand’s iconic stick vacuum is a whopping 54% off for Black Friday on Amazon (for Prime members). Get all the cleaning and suction power of a Dyson in a slim and cordless set with up to 40 minutes of run time and an advanced filtration system that promises to trap 99.99% of dust and particles as small as 0.3 microns.

Shark AZ2002 Vertex Powered Lift-Away Upright Vacuum

Need more cleaning power? Shark’s upright vacuum features “lift away” technology, a “PowerFins brushroll” and a soft roller that combine to pick up more dust, pet hair and debris from your floors and carpets. At 55% off, this is one of the biggest Black Friday discount son Shark vacuums online.

SAMSUNG 32-Inch Odyssey Curved Gaming Monitor

This Samsung 32-Inch Odyssey Curved Monitor has premium-quality resolution that shows incredibly detailed, pin-sharp images to take your gaming experience to the next level. Images look more life-like and the curved detail empowers your peripheral vision, giving a fuller view of the game. The under-$200 price represents the biggest discount this year.

CHEFMAN Indoor Pizza Oven

For pizza lovers, it could be challenging to make restaurant-quality pizza at home, but this indoor oven is a great option to get closer to that. This CHERMAN Indoor Pizza Oven has six modes: Neapolitan, New York, Thin-Crust, Pan, or Frozen, and makes 12-inch pizzas in minutes. Get it on sale during Black Friday for a massive 60% discount.

PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of The Mountain Bundle (PSVR2)

Take your PlayStation game to the next level and step into the world of virtual reality. This set features eye tracking, headset feedback, 3D Audio and highly intuitive controls for an immersive gaming experience. It’s just one of many gaming consoles marked down for Black Friday.

Garmin vívoactive 5

To the athletes and casual trainers alike, a smartwatch is always must. The Garmin brand is a trusted leader in this space and this watch has 30 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps, a sleep tracker, AMOLED display up to 11 days of battery life and a durable, go-anywhere build. It’s under $200 for the first time too.

DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo with DJI RC 2

$899.00 $1,549.00 42% off

The DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo with DJI RC 2 is at 42% off today, bringing the price down below $1000. What we like: this drone captures images at an impressive 48MP and delivers stunning 4K/60fps HDR videos with dual cameras, so every shot will surely be cinematic and breathtaking.

Cricut Explore 3

The Cricut Explore 3 is a great way to enter your crafting era and DIY almost anything your heart desires. The machine cuts 100+ materials, including cardstock, vinyl, iron-on, glitter paper, cork, and bonded fabric up to 12-feet without a mat, plus includes a digital library of 30 images while cutting 2x faster than its previous version.

GYH LED Face Mask Light Therapy

This LED face mask is described as having 180 professional-grade lamp beads that are six times more powerful than others to help smooth, refine and rejuvenate your skin. At 50% off, it’s the best price for a top-rated red light therapy mask online.

What you’ll like: the high-energy output ensures that you get the maximum benefit from light, with shorter use times of just 5-10 minutes. It’s currently half-off now, but they also offer a two-year worry-free guarantee with full refund so you can upgrade your skincare game with complete ease.

SAMSUNG 75-Inch Class Neo QLED

$1,747.99 $2,997.99 42% off

A number of TVs are on sale for Black Friday including this Samsung 75-Inch Smart TV, which hits all the marks of a high-end TV including 4K resolution, Dolby Atmos, anti-glare technology, a dedicated gaming hub and so much more. Today at 42% off, your home TV experience will be upgraded with its unparalleled brightness, contrast and color.

De’Longhi Magnifica Start Espresso & Coffee Machine

Start your day with a fresh morning brew with this De’Longhi Espresso & Coffee Machine. You can enjoy a latte, macchiato, cappuccino, espresso and coffee served iced or hot. It has an automatic milk frother and a built-in grinder with 13 different settings. Currently at $499, this is the lowest we’ve ever seen it and now is the best time to take advantage.

GOTHAM STEEL Hammered 15-Piece Copper Pots and Pans

A 15-piece non-stick pots and pans set for under $100 is definitely a steal. Besides the unique hammered copper aesthetic, its premium non-stick capability needs no seasoning, oil or butter for healthier meals all around.

ELEPHAS Movie Projector

Sit back, relax and watch your favorite shows in 4K with this projector that’s built for both indoor and outdoor showings. It has a built-in “App Store” compatible with Netflix, Youtube and Prime Video, and can play genuine movie videos without considering copyright.

VOPLLS Full HD Portable Home Theater Projector

Go even smaller with this palm-sized projector, which offers full HD quality and a screen up to 210 inches in size. Amazon says more than 5,000 people have purchased this mini projector in the last few weeks alone.

Venustas Men’s Heated Vest

This is a great vest for any winter-related activity, whether it be skiing, hiking, running or just doing your daily activities. It has four different settings and generates warmth all around the body so you can be comfortable braving the cold, whatever your activities may be.

Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows

These best-selling bed pillows make a great gift or an addition to your collection — reviewers are saying that you get quality, comfort and value all at the same time without compromising your budget. This is a perpetual Amazon bestseller and at 41% off, there’s no better time to refresh your pillow collection at home.

SafeRest Mattress Protector

Keep your mattress investment safe with this highly-rated mattress protector from SafeRest. At 54% off today, it’s an affordable way to ensure protection and comfort for your bed and stay-worry free from any unwanted bugs or elements.

RAK Multitool Pen

There wouldn’t be a pen as versatile as the RAK Multitool — it has eight combined features including led light, stylus top, standard and metric rulers, bubble leveler, bottle opener, flathead and phillips screwdriver, and of course, an actual pen for writing needs.

Samsonite Evolve Se Hardside Expandable Luggage Set

Amazon has a ton of luggage deals for Black Friday but the most worthwhile deal is on this Samsonite set, which gets you two hard-side suitcases for essentially the price of one. Multiple colors are discounted.

See more Amazon Black Friday deals here.
